5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Ibn 'Umar reported:As the people were praying at Quba' a man came to them and said: It has been revealed to file Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) during the night and he has been directed to turn towards the Ka'ba. So turn towards it. Their faces were towards Syria and they turned round towards Ka'ba

chapter.ara-name: باب تَحْوِيلِ الْقِبْلَةِ مِنَ الْقُدْسِ إِلَى الْكَعْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: Changing the qiblah from Al-Quds (Jerusalem) to the Ka`bah
